quotes.1: Small steps every day lead to big changes.

quotes.2: Believe you can, and you're halfway there.

quotes.3: The future depends on what you do today.

quotes.4: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

quotes.5: Hard times may test you, but they will also teach you.

quotes.6: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.7: Dream big, start small, but most of all, start.

quotes.8: Every day may not be good, but there’s something good in every day.

quotes.9: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

quotes.10: Courage doesn’t always roar; sometimes it’s a quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I’ll try again tomorrow.'

quotes.11: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

quotes.12: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

quotes.13: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.

quotes.15: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.

quotes.16: Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.

quotes.17: It’s not about being the best. It’s about being better than you were yesterday.

quotes.18: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

quotes.19: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quotes.20: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
